00009 typedef struct STK_Widget {
00010         SDL_Surface *surface;   // the surface drawn on is this widget
00011         
00012         char *name;             // name of this widget
00013         int type;               // identify the type of this widget, to index this type's other characters.
00014 
00015         SDL_Rect rect;          // the rect area this widget occupy
00016 //      SDL_Rect absolute;      // ??
00017         SDL_Rect clip;          // ??
00018 
00019         Uint32 border;          // the border size of a widget
00020         
00021         SDL_Color bgcolor;
00022         SDL_Color fgcolor;
00023         
00024         Uint32 showborder;      // display the border line or not
00025         Uint32 fixed;           // fixed or extended
00026         Uint32 flags;           // important flag value variable
00027         Uint32 state;
00028 } STK_Widget;
00029 
00030 typedef struct STK_WidgetListNode {
00031         STK_Widget *widget;                     // point to a widget
00032         struct STK_Widget *parent;              // point to the parent widget of this widget
00033         struct STK_Widget *child;               // point to the child widget of this widget
00034         struct STK_WidgetListNode *next;        // point to the next widget of this widget (on the same window)
00035 } STK_WidgetListNode;
